package.name: inspircd-source
package.description: Deploys a source version of inspircd onto the target servers.

pre_deploy: sudo apt-get install -y ntp build-essential git bison flex libssl-dev pkg-config geoip-bin geoip-database libgeoip-dev libgeoip1 libpcre3-dev libgnutls-dev
post_deploy: UL=https://raw.githubusercontent.com/inspircd/inspircd-extras/master/2.0; cd inspircd-2.0.20/src/modules/ && wget $UL/m_invitenotify.cpp && wget $UL/m_totp.cpp && wget $UL/m_namedstats.cpp && wget $UL/m_join0.cpp && wget $UL/m_joinpartsno.cpp && wget $UL/m_override_umode.cpp && wget $UL/m_fullversion.cpp && wget $UL/m_custompenalty.cpp && wget $UL/m_invisible.cpp && wget $UL/m_noctcp_user.cpp && wget $UL/m_quietban.cpp && wget $UL/m_antibear.cpp && wget $UL/m_antibottler.cpp && wget https://goo.gl/ZM9mLz -O m_globalmessageflood.cpp && wget $UL/m_require_auth.cpp && wget $UL/m_flashpolicyd.cpp
